src:
Hasil Pertandingan Vitoria Guimares vs Arsenal: Skor 1-1
07 Nov 2019, 00:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal gagal memetik tiga poin saat bertemu Vitoria Guimares dalam partai lanjutan fase grup Liga Europa yang berlangsung di Estadio D. Afonso Henriques, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam tadi. Kedua tim bermain imbang dengan skor 1-1.
Hasil imbang itu sendiri membuat Arsenal hampir dipastikan melenggang ke babak berikutnya. Mereka memuncaki klasemen dengan raihan 10 poin. Sementara itu, Vitoria SC masih terpuruk di dasar klasemen dengan torehan satu angka saja.
Arsenal langsung mendapatkan peluang pertamanya saat pertandingan baru berjalan delapan menit. Sang penyerang, Nicolas Pepe melepaskan tembakan dari jarak 25 yard yang hanya membentur mistar gawang!
Pada menit ke-19, giliran Vitoria yang menciptakan peluang. Sang bek, Edmond Tapsoba, mendapatkan ruang setelah mendapatkan umpan dari Pepe Rodrigues. Ia membidik pojok kanan gawang Arsenal, namun berhasil ditepis oleh Emiliano Martinez.
Peluang Vitoria lainnya tercipta pada menit ke-31. Dari situasi bola mati, Pepe Rodrigues melepaskan umpan ke kotak penalti yang langsung disambut oleh kepala Frederico Vernancio. Sayangnya, pemain yang bertugas sebagai bek tersebut masih belum menemui sasaran.
Menjelang pertandingan berakhir, Nicolas Pepe mencoba memberikan ancaman dengan tendangan bebasnya. Namun ia tak mampu membidik sasaran dengan tepat. Wasit kemudian menutup babak pertama dengan kedudukan imbang 0-0 bagi kedua tim.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Vitoria Guimares vs Arsenal Results: 1-1
Nov 7 2019, 00:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal failed to pick three points when they met Vitoria Guimares in the next phase of the Europa League group stage which took place at Estadio D. Afonso Henriques, Wednesday (11/06/2019) last night. Both teams drew 1-1.
The draw itself makes Arsenal almost certainly sauntered to the next round. They top the standings with 10 points. Meanwhile, Vitoria SC is still slumped at the bottom of the standings with just one notch.
Arsenal immediately get his first chance when the game has been running for eight minutes. The attacker, Nicolas Pepe fired a shot from 25 yards that only hit the crossbar!
In the 19th minute, it was Vitoria's turn to create chances. The defender, Edmond Tapsoba, got space after getting a pass from Pepe Rodrigues. He aimed at the right corner of the Arsenal goal, but was pushed over by Emiliano Martinez.
Another Vitoria opportunity was created in the 31st minute. From the dead ball situation, Pepe Rodrigues released the bait into the penalty box which was immediately greeted by the head of Frederico Vernancio. Unfortunately, the player who served as a defender is still not meeting targets.
Towards the end of the match, Nicolas Pepe tried to give a threat with his free kick. But he was unable to aim precisely. The referee then closed the first half with a 0-0 draw for both teams.
